function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of user cooperation in contact tracing","Impact":"Ineffective contact tracing and increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement fully automated contact tracing architecture","Technologies":"IoT, AI, ML","People":"Facilities, healthcare providers","Owner":"Health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks in IoT data sharing","Impact":"Unauthorized access to physiological information and breach of privacy","Mitigation":"Implement Blockchain-based method for privacy and security","Technologies":"Blockchain, IoT","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Barriers in adopting IoT-based healthcare","Impact":"Limited access to IoT-enabled healthcare infrastructure and data-driven decision-making","Mitigation":"Address existing enablers and barriers in adopting IoT-based healthcare","Technologies":"IoT, digital healthcare infrastructure","People":"Policy makers, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"}]}
